network.error: Oops! Something went wrong while processing your request.

error400BadRequest.longMessage: The server cannot process the request. Please check the data and try again.

error401Unauthorized.longMessage: You are not authorized to perform this action.

error403Forbidden.longMessage: Access to this resource is forbidden.

error404NotFound.longMessage: The requested resource was not found.

error408Timeout.longMessage: The request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.

error409Conflict.longMessage: The data you're trying to submit conflicts with an existing record.

error429TooManyRequests.longMessage: You have made too many requests in a short period. Please try again later.

error500ServerError.longMessage: A server error occurred. Please contact support if the problem persists.

error503ServiceUnavailable.longMessage: There was a problem reaching the server. Please try again later.
